step.context: \textbf{Check Point } \#1: \text{ Is the function defined} \\ \text{and continuous in } [1, 2] ?
step.tex: \text{Yes. $(4x^3 -5x^2 +6x +9)$ being a polynomial} \\ \text{function is defined and continuous in $[1, 2]$}
step.reason: \int^{b}_{a}f(x)\, dx \text{ makes sense only if f(x) is defined} \\ \text{and continuous in $[a, b]$. For e.g.}\int^{1}_{-1}\dfrac{1}{x}\, dx\\ \text{does not, because $\dfrac{1}{x}$ is discontinuous at $x = 0$.
